dao.db

Class CouponDaoDb

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.db.CouponDaoDb
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CouponDAO

    public class CouponDaoDb
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponDAO
    This layer contains CRUD methods & additional methods for using in the facade layer, according to user needs (no business logic).

        Parameters:
